entry.et: Middle English afere, from Anglo-French afaire, from a faire to do

def.dt: :a procedure, action, or occasion only vaguely specified
:an object or collection of objects only vaguely specified their house was a 2-story affair
:a romantic or passionate attachment typically of limited duration :liaison 2b
:a matter occasioning public anxiety, controversy, or scandal :case
:a romantic attachment or episode between lovers
:a lively enthusiasm America's love affair with baseball
